relics.name: Bent Brush
relics.description:
The first time you Paint each combat, Paint 1 more of that Color.
Refresh this whenever you shuffle your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Damaged in a fit of anger.

relics.name: Brilliant Brush
relics.description: When you Paint a random Color, Paint an additional one.
relics.flavorText: Tape two pens together and that's twice as less lines to write.

relics.name: Broken Brush
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, remove all Colors on the Canvas.
relics.flavorText: You got angrier and totally broke it.

relics.name: Repaired Brush
relics.description:
Replaces Bent Brush.
At the start of each combat, Darken the Canvas.

potions.name: Painting Potion
potions.description: Add a copy of the Canvas into your hand

keywords.name: Chromatic
keywords.description: The Chromatic effect of a card activates if the Canvas contains exactly 2 Colors.

keywords.name: Clear
keywords.description: The Clear effect of a card activates if the Canvas is empty.

keywords.name: Darken
keywords.description: Increase the cost and effectiveness of the Painting.

keywords.name: Paint
keywords.description: Painting a Color adds it to the Canvas.

keywords.name: Painting
keywords.description: Paintings are special cards made from the Canvas.

keywords.name: Rainbow
keywords.description: Color. Paints random colors. Cannot be randomly generated.

keywords.name: Yellow
keywords.description: Color. Grants [E] . Adds Exhaust to the Painting.
